content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location in the city center. I'm sure we can find a price that suits both of our interests. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. As a student, I'm looking for a place that's not only comfortable but also affordable. I'm sure we can find a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and my budget as a student.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your situation, Mr. Wang. However, I must inform you that I am not looking for a 'fair' price. I am looking for the highest price possible. As a landlord, it is my duty to my family to secure the best possible income from my properties. Now, let's start the negotiation. How much are you willing to pay per month for this apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to pay €500 per month for the apartment, considering it's unfurnished and in the city center. This is a reasonable offer, given that I'm a student and the size of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. However, I must inform you that €500 is far below my expectations. I am looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mr. Schmidt. How about we meet in the middle at €600 per month? This is a fair compromise, considering both my budget as a student and the market value of the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate the effort, Mr. Wang. However, meeting in the middle at €600 is still not satisfactory. I am looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm willing to go up to €650 per month, considering the location and the amenities nearby. This is a competitive offer that reflects the market value of similar apartments in the area.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang. However, €650 is still far below my expectations. I am looking for a price that reflects the true value of the apartment. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I must respectfully decline to negotiate further. My offer of €650 per month is a fair reflection of the market value and my budget as a student. If you are unable to meet this price, I don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your position, Mr. Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are unwilling to negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mr. Schmidt. I'm sorry if we couldn't reach an agreement, but I believe my offer of €650 per month is a fair reflection of the market value and my budget as a student. If you have any other apartments or if you reconsider my offer, please let me know.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. I appreciate your understanding. I wish you good luck in your search for an apartment. If you have any questions or if I can assist you in any way, please feel free to contact me. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
